message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you our premium product at a special price of $18000. This is a great opportunity to get a high-value item at a competitive rate. Let me know if you're interested!
Alice, your price is a bit too high for me.  I'm really interested in the product, but my budget is $12000.  Would you be willing to work with me on that price?

Hi Bob, I appreciate your interest in the product. However, $12000 is below our minimum acceptable price. I can offer you the product for $16000, which is a fair compromise considering its value. Let me know if this works for you.

Hi Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but I need to meet a certain threshold. I can lower the price to $16000, which is the best I can do while still valuing the product appropriately. Let me know if this revised offer works for you.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down on the price, but $16000 is still a bit out of my range. I'm willing to go to $13000. This is my final offer. Let me know if you're able to accept it.

Hi Bob, I appreciate your final offer, but $13000 is still below our minimum threshold. I can go as low as $15500, which is my final offer. If this doesn't work for you, I'll have to consider other buyers. Let me know your decision.

Hi Bob, I understand this is your final offer, but $13000 doesn't meet our minimum price. I can offer you the product for $15500, which is my final counteroffer. If this doesn't work for you, I'll need to consider other buyers. Please let me know your decision.
